name: kavita
description: Kavita is a self hosted digital library for manga, comics, light novels and books. It supports reading progress, collections, metadata and multiple users with a rich responsive reader optimized for various devices.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Built-in responsive reader with page-by-page and continuous scroll modes. Read comfortably on any device

features.title: Library Organization
features.description: Automatic series detection, metadata fetching, and collection management. Keep library organized effortlessly

features.title: User Management
features.description: Multiple user accounts with individual reading progress and preferences. Share library with family safely

features.title: Metadata Editing
features.description: Manually edit series information, covers, and metadata. Maintain accurate library details
